backend/main.mo: Initializes access control and blob storage using mixins and exposes them in the actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summarized descriptions of various frontend files used elsewhere for reference.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Provides build and deployment steps plus troubleshooting guidance for environment variables and Internet Identity setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication checks, app shell, and conditional profile setup modal via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Extends generated backend TypeScript types to include the authorization initialization method.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin pages by checking admin status and rendering denial UI or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Login card UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication with loading state and branding.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promotional dashboard card with illustration, fallback styling, and pagination dots.
Configurable dashboard shortcut tile with icon, optional badge, coming-soon state, and click behavior.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Clickable brand row showing icon and name with graceful fallback to a generic icon on load error.
Displays a limited number of tag badges with an optional "+N" badge for remaining tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save gift card labels with change detection and loading states.
Offers a popover-based tag filter allowing users to search, select, and clear label filters.
Renders a rate table showing NGN rates per tier for a selected gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Shows a compact NGN rate summary or an unavailable-rate warning based on matched tier data.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet that lets users search and select gift card brands from a filtered list.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, mobile drawer menu, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Provides a mobile bottom navigation dock with active route highlighting and coming-soon items.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a new user profile with name and username inputs and async submission.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Defines default conversion rates and a function to compute gross, fee, and net amounts with optional overrides.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Defines gift card brand metadata and provides a filter function for searching brands.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN rate tiers for gift cards, brand overrides, and helpers to select and format applicable tiers.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendor payout configurations and selects the vendor yielding the highest net payout for a given amount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports the hook for fetching the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, and transactions into a unified dashboard data object.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and state management utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Manages local storage–based suppression state for profile setup prompts keyed by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, gift cards, and KYC/withdrawal features, mostly with unimplemented backend calls. Includes mutations that invalidate relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Extracts wallet balance and currency from the current user's profile and returns them with loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for merging class names, formatting currency values, and formatting timestamps into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React root, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin page scaffold for searching a user by principal and reviewing KYC submissions, wrapped in an admin route guard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin interface to view pending withdrawals and approve or reject them using query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with balance info, quick-action shortcuts, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary tests.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Helper function that computes the matching NGN rate tier for a brand and amount.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form page for creating a gift card with brand selection, currency, amount, code, image upload, and NGN rate tier preview.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays detailed gift card info, allows status updates, tag editing, and shows NGN rate table for the brand.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with tag filtering, basic card info, and navigation to add or view individual cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Sell flow for a gift card including amount entry, vendor selection, conversion calculation, and NGN rate tier lookup.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Handles user KYC submission with file upload, form state, status display, and submission via query hooks.
Placeholder page for buying airtime, logging a local transaction after basic form submission.
Placeholder page for betting account top‑ups, logging a local transaction after form submission.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Renders a placeholder bills payment form that logs a local 'bills' transaction after validation and a mock delay.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Provides a placeholder crypto transfer form that logs a local 'crypto' transaction using a mock processing delay.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Implements a placeholder mobile data purchase form that records a local 'data' transaction after basic validation.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: Handles viewing withdrawals, submitting withdrawal requests, and managing payout methods using query hooks and form inputs.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction storage with functions to add, retrieve, and clear up to 50 recent transactions in localStorage.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for currencies, users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC records, payout methods, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript typings for environment variables used by the frontend, including Internet Identity settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, path aliases, env variable shims, build chunking, dev server proxying, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a fix request for missing NGN rate display and listing existing related features and issues.
